spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dermot casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dermot makes one Warhammer attack and one Searing Wrath attack.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Searing Wrath
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage, and the target is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.
